question: Write a letter to be copied to all neighbours that share the parking area. In that letter• explaining the problems• suggesting ways to help the situation• proposing a possible meeting
text: I am writing this to bring your attention to a problem that we are facing in our parking area.

To begin with, let me share my experience. A few days ago, when I was going to park my vehicle at my usual spot, it was already occupied by an unknown vehicle, which forced me to park my vehicle   outside where we do not have enough protection. On another day, there was inaccurate parking, occupying almost two slots per car.
In order to overcome these issues, I suggest we should have a plan and we must name our own parking slots. Moreover, we must arrange  alternative parking for the visitors.
Finally, I urge we must meet, to discuss this in a broad manner, and I hope others might have their own solutions as well.
I would appreciate your kind and immediate attention to this matter, and I look forward to hearing from you all.
